lead_paragraph: After more than 50 years at downstate tracks, the Woodward Stakes will move north this summer to anchor the last weekend of racing at Saratoga Race Course. The six-week meeting at Saratoga usually peaks with the Travers Stakes, run on the last Saturday in August. New York racing officials hope the Woodward will carry the momentum — and the fan support — into Labor Day weekend. The race will be run Sept. 2.
